title: The Fair Singer - speaker might have avoided

content.question: The speaker says that he might have avoided his present state if

choices.label: he had accepted his flaws and tried to improve
he had employed a more persuasive strategy
the woman had possessed only one powerful attribute
the woman had made less use of nature than of art

content.answer: the woman had possessed only one powerful attribute

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
